title: 820-01700 on power
message:
This mac has a damaged r7900 resistor, I replaced it, but the PPbus started oscillating, I guess the U7800 is defective, right ? 

Looking at the thermal camera the u7800 is oscillating the temperature.

title: 820-01700 on power
message:
As simple as check diode mode to ground after R7900.
You should get much lower value than a good board; maybe not short directly.

title: 820-01700 on power
message:
I don't have a reading form good board to compare.
Doesn't look to low, so I suspect U7800 first.
Just in case, you can check first the filter caps placed there.

BTW, don't write the end "v" after diode mode readings!
